_header: Know well ere thou knit too fast / For often rape rueth at last

BodRawPoe32.Transcription:
Know well or þou knyt to fastffor ofte Iape rewyþe at
                    last
BodRawPoe32.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius. 
             “The Prouerbis of Wysdom.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         90 (1893): 241-68: 244.
Smith,  William George. 
             The Oxford Dictionary of English Proverbs.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; rev. ed. 1948: 253.
